tool_description:
Indix APIs for products, prices, promotions, stores and more.  The Most Comprehensive Product Intelligence Platform
Sell More. Acquire Customers. Increase Productivity.
name: Indix
title: Indix

api_list.name: Search Products - Retrieves a list of products matching a variety of query parameters
api_list.description: Returns a collection of products matching a specified query, along with a variety of statistics about the query results. Requires at least one of query, brandId, storeId, or categoryId.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: The product search term - could be either product title, SKU, UPC or MPN. To search by SKU input 'sku:<value>'. For UPC search, input 'upc:<value>'.

optional_parameters.name: storeId
optional_parameters.description: Limits results to products sold at store with id int. Supports multiple, comma-separated values (acts as OR operator)

optional_parameters.name: brandId
optional_parameters.description: Limits results to products of brand with id int. Supports multiple, comma-separated values (acts as OR operator

optional_parameters.name: categoryId
optional_parameters.description: Limits results to products of category with this id

optional_parameters.name: startPrice
optional_parameters.description: Combined with end_price, limits results to products sold by at least one store at a price between start and end

optional_parameters.name: endPrice
optional_parameters.description: Combined with start_price, limits results to products sold by at least one store at a price between start and end

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: Sort by values - RELEVANCE, PRICE_LOW_TO_HIGH, PRICE_HIGH_TO_LOW, MOST_RECENT

optional_parameters.name: pageNumber
optional_parameters.description: The page number of the result set to return. 10 results per page, plus similar items.

api_list.name: Price History - Returns all the prices recorded for the product in the last 30 days
api_list.description: Price History - Returns the price history for a product. Returns price history for 30 days prior to the current date.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-indix.p.rapidapi.com/products/0337f11a8791006098ad72fd23b1e053/prices"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-indix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-indix.p.rapidapi.com/products/{id}/prices"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-indix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Brands - Lists all brands along with their IDs
api_list.description: Lists all brands, along with their IDs, matching query term. Does not support wildcards. Limit is 10 results per query.

api_list.name: Product Details - Returns detailed information for a product and similar products
api_list.description: This operation returns the product and price details for the specified product and the products similar to it.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The Indix product identifier - should be a 32-digit HEX value retrieved via the Product Search API

optional_parameters.name: pageNumber
optional_parameters.description: The page number of the result set to return. 10 results per page, plus similar items

api_list.name: Export Categories - Lists all categories along with their IDs and path
api_list.description: Lists all categories along with their IDs and ancestry
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-indix.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-indix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-indix.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-indix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Stores - Lists all stores along with their IDs
api_list.description: Lists all stores, along with their IDs, matching the query term. Does not support wildcards. Limit 10 results per query.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Search term to match against store name. Partial match. Case insensitive
